text: He will rectify your deeds for you and forgive you your sins�He said:When God gives someone success in enabling him to perform good deeds, this is a sign that he is forgiven, for God, Exalted is He, has said: He will rectify your deeds for you and forgive you your sins. But God, Transcendent and Exalted is He, knows best.His words, Exalted is He:
